SELECT c.*, IFNULL(s.schedule_no, 0) AS schedule_count FROM clubs c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT club_no, COUNT(*) AS schedule_no FROM schedules GROUP BY club_no ) s ON c.club_no = s.club_no ORDER BY schedule_count DESC;
